content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/"><ShortName>EMSA - European Maritime Safety Agency</ShortName><Description>The European Maritime Safety Agency (EMSA) is a European Union agency charged with reducing the risk of maritime accidents, marine pollution from ships and the loss of human lives at sea by helping to enforce the pertinent EU legislation. It is headquartered in Lisbon.</Description><InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding><Image type="image/vnd.microsoft.icon" width="16" height="16">http://www.emsa.europa.eu/templates/emsa2014/favicon.ico</Image><Url type="application/opensearchdescription+xml" rel="self" template="http://www.emsa.europa.eu/component/search/?cid=117&format=opensearch"/><Url type="text/html" template="http://www.emsa.europa.eu/index.php?option=com_search&searchword={searchTerms}&Itemid=400"/></OpenSearchDescription>
